name: Defend Your Bounty!
description: A tower-defence-esque game developed for the OGA Spring Game Jam 2019 (https://itch.io/jam/the-oga-spring-game-jam). Build a fort, defend waves of enemies trying to steal your bounty, and survive boss attacks. This game is created entirely with assets from OpenGameArt.org. Lots of respect to every artist that uploads there for aspiring game devs (who cant draw, or write music).
